item.title: The auto industry is pulling back on its ‘capital junkie’ tendencies after unprecedented spending on EVs, self-driving
item.description: After years of spending capital freely on all-electric and autonomous vehicles, automakers are starting to pull back.

item.title: Some Dems back Trump-pick Rubio for Secretary of State but remain critical of Hegseth, Gabbard and Gorka
item.description: Trump has made a flurry of cabinet picks in the last two weeks and eyes are now on the U.S. Senate to confirm them.

item.title: Thanksgiving dinner is historically affordable this year
item.description: Data shows holiday meal staples are collectively at their cheapest, after adjusting for inflation, in nearly 40 years — not including Covid-hit 2020.

item.title: Can Starbucks fix long lines at its airport cafes?
item.description: Starbucks CEO Brian Niccol has said airport stores' performance could improve.

item.title: Hyundai announce recall of more than 42,000 vehicles due to wiring issue that can cause them to roll
item.description: The 2025 Hyundai Santa Cruz and Hyundai Tucson vehicles have transmissions that can shift out of "park" without the break pedal having to be applied.
